rows.label: xs01090100_MSG0001
rows.name:
This is the BLADE Tower.
The headquarters overseeing all of BLADE is in here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01090100_MSG0002
rows.name:
Uncle Nagi and Commander Vandham
usually work here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01090100_MSG0003
rows.name: Also, centered around Director General Maurice,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01090100_MSG0004
rows.name:
the headquarters of the Provisional Government,
which handles NLA's administration, is also here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01090100_MSG0005
rows.name:
You'll be reporting important missions to them.
Remember this place, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01090100_MSG0006
rows.name: That's about it for the general explanation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01090100_MSG0006_3
rows.name:
Did you get how wonderful
BLADE is?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01090100_MSG0006_4
rows.name: Makes you want to join, doesn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01090100_MSG0009
rows.name:
It's fine if you just know
in what kind of environment we carry out missions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01090100_MSG0010
rows.name: Now that you've seen where and how we work...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01090100_MSG0011
rows.name:
I'll be happy if it helps you decide
whether or not to become a BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01090100_MSG0012
rows.name:
Nagi's waiting, so
let's head back to the BLADE Home for now.[ST:wait ]
